column5: So I'm off to visit the mom&pops next weekend in Bob Izumi's home town Blenheim.  It's right by Rondeau Provincial Park and thought I'd check if any of you know a reasonable place to rent a boat or a productive shore location to kill a few hrs?
The Summer Place just outside Rondeau Park rents boats,They are right on the Bay.They are a tent /trailer park,marina etc.

On the opposite side of Rondeau Bay (approx. 15 minute drive) is the Town of Erieau.  There is a pier on the lake side of town.  At times, the perch fishing can be awesome off the pier.  Morning and evenings have worked best for me.  Good luck   Cheers  Craig
